statements: SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, total_price FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT order_id, product_name, total_price FROM orders WHERE total_price < 100.00;
SELECT order_id, quantity, product_name FROM orders ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, total_price FROM orders WHERE quantity = 5 ORDER BY total_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_price > 100 ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY order_id HAVING SUM(quantity) > 100
SELECT product_name, total_price FROM orders WHERE total_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY total_price ASC
SELECT order_id, product_name, total_price FROM orders WHERE order_timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_price DESC
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM order_audit_trail WHERE action = 'CANCEL';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT order_id, action, timestamp FROM order_audit_trail WHERE action IN ('CREATE', 'UPDATE') ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT order_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_sum FROM orders GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_sum > 5000;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_cost, order_date FROM Orders;
SELECT order_detail_id, product_id, quantity, unit_price FROM OrderDetails ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT audit_id, order_id, audit_type, audit_timestamp FROM OrderAuditTrail WHERE audit_type = 'update';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_cost, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT order_detail_id, product_id, quantity, unit_price FROM OrderDetails WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_cost FROM Orders JOIN OrderDetails ON Orders.order_id = OrderDetails.order_id WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT order_id, total_cost, order_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = '684c0d4b-2a22-45e2-ba9d-3b00d4e2b494' ORDER BY total_cost ASC, order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, audit_type, audit_timestamp FROM Orders JOIN OrderAuditTrail ON Orders.order_id = OrderAuditTrail.order_id WHERE audit_type = 'updated' ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT count(*) as total_orders, sum(total_cost) as total_cost FROM Orders;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, timestamp FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_trail ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, timestamp, product_id FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'UPDATE' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
